activities.loc: JCB Check Monitor & Posted Calendar for Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Thomas L Greschner

10:52 AM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Thomas L Greschner appeared by video. 
THIS COVERS 22CF105, 22TR475,and 22TR476. 
Blue form was mailed to the defendant. Defendant will fax the form back to the Clerk's office. May appear by zoom video.

Adjourned initial appearance on April 27, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-908-8473. 

Must not possess or consume alcoholic beverages.
May not go onto any premises where alcohol is sold. 
Must not operate a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license. 
Must not possess any firearms.

1:01 PM Defendant Thomas L Greschner appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow appeared by video for Thomas L Greschner for today only. Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant must call the public defender's office to determine eligibility.  If the defendant does not qualify for public defender representation, the defendant must complete a Petition for Appointment of an Attorney, Affidavit of Indigency also known as the blue form in order for the court to consider appointing an attorney.   Address and phone number confirmed.  AIA set and may appear in person or by Zoom.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 27, 2022 at 10:00 am.
